name: Cuelogic Technologies
description:
At Cuelogic, we service for software, data, intelligence & security for businesses. Our Agile Thinking helps businesses to be software driven and leverage technology as their competitive edge. For businesses we are enabler, to unleash values like - brand, loyalty, customer, intelligence - that they have build or are looking to build. 
Our technologists are highly skilled and our developers seasoned.  A R&D teams helps the internal and external stake holders to stay on top of technological challenges. 
The Cuelogic way is to deliver organizational agility. To help our partners with continuity - Business Performance, Innovation & Relevance. 
Product Engineering, Big Data, AI & ML, IoT, Security, Cloud Services, Blockchain are at our core. 
Though we are industry/domain agnostic - our 12+ years of experience have led us to work with - Finance, Education, Media, Research, Health, Travel, Manufacturing, Consumer Goods. 
We have delivery centres in India and the USA and with a strenght of  200+ polyglot technologists our clients trust us with their mission critical products, data and intelligence.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Unit 503, 5th Floor, Godrej Castlemaine, Bund Garden Road, Next To Ruby Hall Clinic
